Material Type: Aluminum alloy

ZAYAD Reacher grabber USES the premium aluminum alloy materials, you can pick up 3 pounds, don’t worry about
grabber could break,it has a very comfortable handle and a rubber chuck, You can pick up small
objects in red wine glasses and crevices.

After surgery patients or elderly, act not convenient, don’t need to bend over you can pickup
the garbage in the garden, protection from already of lumbar spine, for children, it does
not need to stand on a table or on the steps, you can easily get high objects.

Use it for:
Picking up trash and litter.
Picking up broken glass pieces.
Reaching under furniture and beds.
Retrieving items in hard to reach cabinets.
Picking up daily things such as the newspaper.
Plus many many more uses.

How to Use
1. The arrow on the plastic part of the folding place is aimed at the groove on the aluminum alloy pole.
2. The aluminum alloy chuck is inserted into the hole in the plastic part.
3. Pull the handle switch, clamp the head to close, loosen the switch, clip the head to loosen.

Number of packages: 1 PCS

FOLDABLE DESIGN: Adopt folding type design, shorten length, facilitate outdoor carry, also can collect in the cabinet, make the home puts more neat and beautiful.
ROTATING & RUBBERIZED JAW: Jaw can rotate a full 360 degrees in 90 increments to be used both vertically and horizontally for hard to reach places.

Product Description

Cool gadgets tool for mechanics, electricians, handyman, craftsman, engineers, DIYers to do some repair work.

The flexible flashlight is plenty bright enough for a tight enclosed space or dark working corner.Lightweight, strong magnets, good battery life.Small clip to secure telescoping flashlight to your pocket.No need to bend over or get up and look for a flashlight when you drop something metal.Lightweight easy to carry in purse, bag, car, basically anywhere.Extending magnet tool has a bending neck with 360° flexibility, and it will help you reach the awkward, cramped space.

Valentines day gifts for him husbandBirthday gifts for men who have everythingChristmas giftsFather day giftsStocking stuffers for Men / WomenThanksgiving day giftsUnique Gifts for Men & Women Who Have Everything!

Gifts for Men & Cool Gadget: Mens gifts for Dad, Husband, Boyfriend on Christmas, Thanksgiving Day, Birthday, Valentine’s Day, Father’s Day, etc. Men won’t know they need a magnetic pickup tool until they have! A cool gadget, unusual gift idea for men women who have everything. Unique stocking stuffers for men and women will be glad to add this item to their toolboxes.
Magnetic Pickup Tool Kit (5 Pieces): The kits includes 1 Telescoping Flexible Extensible Mini Flashlights, 1 Round 360° Swivel Adjustable Inspection Mirror, 1 Square 360° Swivel Adjustable Inspection Mirror, 1 piece 15lb Magnetic Pick Up Rod and 1 piece 1lb Magnetic Pick Up Rod.
Super Bright Flashlight：The super bright LED light has 3pcs super-bright LED beads to provide greater visibility in dark spaces. The telescoping flexible head with a powerful magnet can accurately pick up metal objects from hard-to-reach areas. And the magnetic base can be attached to the metal, free your hands, to illuminate the place where you need it.
360°Rotation Round & Square Inspection Mirrors: Telescoping inspection mirror is a good tool to meet your inspection needs, with a telescoping rod, the length of the handheld rod can be adjusted according to your needs, and it can be reduced to the smallest size after use, which is convenient to carry and store; the neck mirror can be rotated 360 degrees for easy observation hard-to-reach areas.
Widely Application: Could be used for finding metal nuts, bolts, screws, and other metal pieces; It’s easy to retrieve and pickup nails, pieces, small metal block and debris in tight spaces or hard to reach corners, such as behind HVAC appliances, cabinets, automobile parts, work benches etc.

Product Description

This is the most cost-effective product in the DIY class after many R&D and design configurations.

It is a wonderful companion for manual work.

This set of products includes everything you need. It is a must in your home garage. Standard and precision screwdrivers used to handle various sizes of work, it can effectively help you complete large and small tasks.Whether you are a mechanic or a DIY enthusiast, this set of products can accompany you for a long time and is a very practical and cost-effective partner. At the same time, it is also a great gift-giving option. Give it to husband, father, teacher, brother, and of course to female mechanics, including any DIY enthusiast. Anyone who receives this product will have nothing but praise.

21-PIECE MAGNETIC SCREWDRIVERS

SLOTTED screwdriver: SL3 x 3″, SL4 x 3″, SL5 x 4″, SL6 x 4″, SL6 x 5″, SL6 x 6″, SL8 x 6″PHILLIPS screwdriver: PH0 x 3″, PH1 x 3″, PH2 x 4″, PH2 x 5″, PH2 x 6″, PH3 x 6″TORX screwdriver: T15 x 3″, T20 x 3″, T25 x 4″, T30 x 4″SQUARE screwdriver: S0 x 3″, S1 x 3″, S2 x 4″POZI screwdriver: PZ0 x 3″
